title: Annuity savings fund; annual statement
context: §88-112 Annuity savings fund; annual statement. The annuity savings fund shall be comprised of the members&rsquo; accumulated contributions, which beginning July 1, 1988, shall include any contributions made by the member to the post retirement fund. A member shall be mailed an annual statement showing the member&rsquo;s accumulated contributions upon request therefor. [L 1925, c 55, pt of §8; RL 1935, pt of §7927; RL 1945, pt of §712, subs 1; RL 1955, §6-81; am L 1959, c 174, §1; HRS §88-102; am L 1969, c 110, pt of §1; gen ch 1985; am L 1988, c 41, §6]
